name: Source | Destination
description:
An entry to the 2018 Global Game Jam.

Story

I'm Sonny Kymco, faithful husband and father.

One day, my wife suddenly has a strange, obnoxious voice.

I've tried everything to no avail.

And then, I was forced into a dream.

Probably there, I can solve the mystery of my wife's weird transmission... 

Important Notes

Since this game uses some data from the RMXP RTP (run-time package), it is VERY important that the package must be installed first. This can be downloaded from

http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages (click the "RPG Maker XP" tab)

Also, the Encode Sans Compressed font must be installed in order to view the game's text. This is provided with this install package (EncodeSansCompressed-Regular.ttf).
